query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cms_section_revisions (
  id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  sectionId INT NOT NULL,
  pageId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT DEFAULT NULL,
  userName VARCHAR(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  action ENUM('create','update','delete','restore','copy','move') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'update',
  fieldChanged VARCHAR(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  previousData JSON DEFAULT NULL,
  newData JSON DEFAULT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  KEY idx_section (sectionId),
  KEY idx_page (pageId),
  KEY idx_created (createdAt)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
